00026         public static void DrawAlpha(this Graphics gx, Bitmap image, byte transparency, int x, int y)
00027         {
00028             using (Graphics gxSrc = Graphics.FromImage(image))
00029             {
00030                 IntPtr hdcDst = gx.GetHdc();
00031                 IntPtr hdcSrc = gxSrc.GetHdc();
00032                 BlendFunction blendFunction = new BlendFunction();
00033                 blendFunction.BlendOp = (byte)BlendOperation.AC_SRC_OVER;   // Only supported blend operation
00034                 blendFunction.BlendFlags = (byte)BlendFlags.Zero;           // Documentation says put 0 here
00035                 blendFunction.SourceConstantAlpha = transparency;           // Constant alpha factor
00036                 blendFunction.AlphaFormat = (byte)0;                        // Don't look for per pixel alpha
00037                 PlatformAPIs.AlphaBlend(hdcDst, x, y, image.Width, image.Height, 
00038                                hdcSrc, 0, 0, image.Width, image.Height, blendFunction);
00039                 gx.ReleaseHdc(hdcDst);                                      // Required cleanup to GetHdc()
00040                 gxSrc.ReleaseHdc(hdcSrc);                                   // Required cleanup to GetHdc()
00041             }
00042         }
00043

00045         public static void DrawImageAlphaChannel(this Graphics gx, IImage image, int x, int y)
00046         {
00047             ImageInfo imageInfo = new ImageInfo();
00048             image.GetImageInfo(out imageInfo);
00049             Rectangle rc = new Rectangle(x, y, (int)imageInfo.Width + x, (int)imageInfo.Height + y);
00050             IntPtr hdc = gx.GetHdc();
00051             image.Draw(hdc, ref rc, IntPtr.Zero);
00052             gx.ReleaseHdc(hdc);
00053         }
00054 
00055         public static void DrawImageAlphaChannel(this Graphics gx, IImage image, Rectangle dest)
00056         {           
00057             Rectangle rc = new Rectangle(dest.X, dest.Y, dest.Width + dest.X, dest.Height + dest.Y);
00058             IntPtr hdc = gx.GetHdc();
00059             image.Draw(hdc, ref rc, IntPtr.Zero);
00060             gx.ReleaseHdc(hdc);
00061         }

00073         public static void DrawGradientRoundedRectangleAlpha(this Graphics gx, Rectangle rc, Color startColorValue, Color endColorValue, Color borderColor, Size size, byte transparency)
00074         {
00075 
00076             // Prepare image for gradient
00077             Bitmap gradientImage = new Bitmap(rc.Width, rc.Height);
00078             // Create temporary graphics
00079             Graphics gxGradient = Graphics.FromImage(gradientImage);
00080             // This is our rectangle
00081             Rectangle roundedRect = new Rectangle(0, 0, rc.Width, rc.Height);
00082             // Fill in gradient
00083             GradientFill.Fill(
00084                 gxGradient,
00085                 roundedRect,
00086                 startColorValue,
00087                 endColorValue,
00088                 FillDirection.TopToBottom);           
00089           
00090             // Prepare the copy of the screen graphics
00091             Bitmap tempBitmap = new Bitmap(240, 320);
00092             Graphics tempGx = Graphics.FromImage(tempBitmap);
00093             // Copy from the screen's graphics to the temp graphics
00094             CopyGraphics(gx, tempGx, 240, 320);                
00095             // Draw the gradient image with transparency on the temp graphics
00096             tempGx.DrawAlpha(gradientImage, transparency, rc.X, rc.Y);
00097             // Cut out the transparent image 
00098             gxGradient.DrawImage(tempBitmap, new Rectangle(0, 0, rc.Width, rc.Height), rc, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
00099             // Prepare for imposing
00100             roundedRect.Width--;
00101             roundedRect.Height--;
00102             // Impose the rounded rectangle with transparent color
00103             Bitmap borderImage = ImposeRoundedRectangle(roundedRect, borderColor, size);
00104             // Draw the transparent rounded rectangle
00105             ImageAttributes attrib = new ImageAttributes();
00106             attrib.SetColorKey(Color.Green, Color.Green);
00107             gxGradient.DrawImage(borderImage, new Rectangle(0, 0, rc.Width, rc.Height), 0, 0, borderImage.Width, borderImage.Height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel, attrib);                      
00108             // OK... now are ready to draw the final image on the original graphics
00109             gx.DrawImageTransparent(gradientImage, rc); 
00110          
00111             // Clean up
00112             attrib.Dispose();
00113             tempGx.Dispose();
00114             tempBitmap.Dispose();
00115             gradientImage.Dispose();
00116             gxGradient.Dispose();            
00117         }
00118 
00119         private static void CopyGraphics(Graphics gxSrc, Graphics gxDest, int width, int height)
00120         {
00121             IntPtr destDc = gxDest.GetHdc();
00122             IntPtr srcDc = gxSrc.GetHdc();
00123             PlatformAPIs.BitBlt(destDc, 0, 0, width, height, srcDc, 0, 0, TernaryRasterOperations.SRCCOPY);
00124             gxSrc.ReleaseHdc(srcDc);
00125             gxDest.ReleaseHdc(destDc);          
00126         }
00127         
00134         public static void DrawImageTransparent(this Graphics gx, Image image, Rectangle destRect)
00135         {
00136             ImageAttributes imageAttr = new ImageAttributes();
00137             Color transpColor = GetTransparentColor(image);
00138             imageAttr.SetColorKey(transpColor, transpColor);
00139             gx.DrawImage(image, destRect, 0, 0, image.Width, image.Height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel, imageAttr);
00140             imageAttr.Dispose();
00141         }

00151         public static Bitmap GetGradientRectangle(Rectangle rc, Color startColorValue, Color endColorValue, FillDirection fillDirection)
00152         {
00153              Bitmap outputImage = new Bitmap(rc.Width, rc.Height);
00154              // Create temporary graphics
00155              Graphics gx = Graphics.FromImage(outputImage);
00156 
00157               GradientFill.Fill(
00158                 gx,
00159                 rc,
00160                 startColorValue,
00161                 endColorValue,
00162                 fillDirection);
00163 
00164               return outputImage;
00165         }

00175         public static void FillGradientRectangle(this Graphics gx, Rectangle rc, Color startColorValue, Color endColorValue, FillDirection fillDirection)
00176         {          
00177             GradientFill.Fill(
00178               gx,
00179               rc,
00180               startColorValue,
00181               endColorValue,
00182               fillDirection);            
00183         }
00184         
00185         private static Color GetTransparentColor(Image image)
00186         {
00187             return ((Bitmap)image).GetPixel(image.Width - 1, image.Height - 1);
00188         }

00199         public static void DrawGradientRoundedRectangle(this Graphics gx, Rectangle rc, Color startColorValue, Color endColorValue, Color borderColor, Size size)
00200         {           
00201             Bitmap bitmap = GetGradiendRoundedRectangle(new Rectangle(0, 0, rc.Width, rc.Height), startColorValue, endColorValue, borderColor, size);
00202             gx.DrawImageTransparent(bitmap, rc);                         
00203         }

00214         public static Bitmap GetGradiendRoundedRectangle(Rectangle rc, Color startColorValue, Color endColorValue,  Color borderColor, Size size)
00215         {
00216             Bitmap outputImage = new Bitmap(rc.Width, rc.Height);
00217             // Create temporary graphics
00218             Graphics gx = Graphics.FromImage(outputImage);
00219 
00220             GradientFill.Fill(
00221                 gx,
00222                 rc,
00223                 startColorValue,
00224                 endColorValue,
00225                 FillDirection.TopToBottom);
00226 
00227             Rectangle roundedRect = rc;
00228             roundedRect.Width--;
00229             roundedRect.Height--;
00230 
00231             Bitmap borderImage = ImposeRoundedRectangle(roundedRect, borderColor, size);
00232            
00233             ImageAttributes attrib = new ImageAttributes();
00234             attrib.SetColorKey(Color.Green, Color.Green);
00235 
00236             gx.DrawImage(borderImage, rc, 0, 0, borderImage.Width, borderImage.Height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel, attrib); 
00237            
00238             // Clean up
00239             attrib.Dispose();
00240             gx.Dispose();
00241 
00242             return outputImage;           
00243         }

00254         public static Bitmap GradiendRoundedRectangle2(Rectangle rc, Color startColorValue, Color endColorValue, Color borderColor, Size size)
00255         {
00256             Bitmap outputImage = new Bitmap(rc.Width, rc.Height);
00257             Graphics gx = Graphics.FromImage(outputImage);
00258 
00259             Rectangle rectTopMiddle = new Rectangle(0, 0, rc.Width, rc.Height / 2);
00260 
00261             Rectangle rectMiddleBottom = new Rectangle(0, rc.Height / 2, rc.Width, rc.Height / 2);
00262 
00263 
00264             GradientFill.Fill(
00265                 gx,
00266                 rectTopMiddle,
00267                 endColorValue,
00268                 startColorValue,                
00269                 FillDirection.TopToBottom);
00270 
00271             GradientFill.Fill(
00272                gx,
00273                rectMiddleBottom,               
00274                startColorValue,
00275                endColorValue,
00276                FillDirection.TopToBottom);
00277 
00278 
00279             Rectangle roundedRect = rc;
00280             roundedRect.Width--;
00281             roundedRect.Height--;
00282 
00283             Bitmap borderImage = ImposeRoundedRectangle(roundedRect, Color.Green, size);
00284 
00285             ImageAttributes attrib = new ImageAttributes();
00286             attrib.SetColorKey(Color.Green, Color.Green);
00287             gx.DrawImage(borderImage, rc, 0, 0, borderImage.Width, borderImage.Height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel, attrib);
00288 
00289             attrib.Dispose();
00290             gx.Dispose();
00291 
00292             return outputImage;
00293         }
00294 
00295         private static Bitmap ImposeRoundedRectangle(Rectangle rc, Color borderColor, Size size)
00296         {          
00297 
00298             Bitmap bitmap = new Bitmap(rc.Width + 1, rc.Height + 1);
00299             //Create temp graphics
00300             Graphics gxTemp = Graphics.FromImage(bitmap);
00301             gxTemp.Clear(Color.White);
00302             DrawRoundedRectangle(gxTemp, borderColor, Color.Green, rc, size);
00303             gxTemp.Dispose();
00304             return bitmap;
00305         }
00306 
00315         public static void DrawRoundedRectangle(this Graphics gx, Color borderColor, Color backColor, Rectangle rc, Size size)
00316         {
00317             Pen borderPen = new Pen(borderColor);
00318             DrawRoundedRect(gx, borderPen, backColor, rc, size);
00319             borderPen.Dispose();
00320         }

00322         public static void DrawRectandleAlpha(this Graphics gx, Color borderColor, Color backColor, Rectangle rc, byte transparency)
00323         {
00324             Bitmap tempBitmap = new Bitmap(rc.Width, rc.Height);
00325             Graphics tempGraphics = Graphics.FromImage(tempBitmap);
00326             using(Brush backColorBrush = new SolidBrush(backColor))
00327             {
00328                 tempGraphics.FillRectangle(backColorBrush, new Rectangle(0, 0, rc.Width, rc.Height));
00329             }
00330 
00331             using (Pen borderPen = new Pen(borderColor))
00332             {
00333                 tempGraphics.DrawRectangle(borderPen, new Rectangle(0, 0, rc.Width, rc.Height));
00334             }
00335 
00336             gx.DrawAlpha(tempBitmap, transparency, rc.X, rc.Y);
00337             tempBitmap.Dispose();
00338             tempGraphics.Dispose();
00339             
00340         }

00342         public static void DrawRoundedRectangleAlpha(this Graphics gx, Color borderColor, Color backColor, Rectangle rc, Size size, byte transparency)
00343         {
00344             Pen borderPen = new Pen(borderColor);
00346             //Bitmap tempBitmap = new Bitmap(rc.Width, rc.Height);
00347             //Graphics tempGraphics = Graphics.FromImage(tempBitmap);
00348             //DrawRoundedRect(tempGraphics, borderPen, backColor, new Rectangle(0, 0, rc.Width, rc.Width), size);
00349             //gx.DrawAlpha(tempBitmap, transparency, rc.X, rc.Y);
00350 
00352             //borderPen.Dispose();
00353             //tempGraphics.Dispose();
00354             //tempBitmap.Dispose();
00355 
00356             // Prepare image for gradient
00357             Bitmap roundedImage = new Bitmap(rc.Width, rc.Height);
00358             // Create temporary graphics
00359             Graphics gxRounded = Graphics.FromImage(roundedImage);
00360             // This is our rectangle
00361             Rectangle roundedRect = new Rectangle(0, 0, rc.Width, rc.Height);
00362             // Draw rounded rect
00363             DrawRoundedRect(gxRounded, borderPen, backColor, new Rectangle(0, 0, rc.Width, rc.Width), size);
00364 
00365             // Prepare the copy of the screen graphics
00366             Bitmap tempBitmap = new Bitmap(240, 320);
00367             Graphics tempGx = Graphics.FromImage(tempBitmap);
00368             // Copy from the screen's graphics to the temp graphics
00369             CopyGraphics(gx, tempGx, 240, 320);
00370             // Draw the gradient image with transparency on the temp graphics
00371             tempGx.DrawAlpha(roundedImage, transparency, rc.X, rc.Y);
00372             // Cut out the transparent image 
00373             gxRounded.DrawImage(tempBitmap, new Rectangle(0, 0, rc.Width, rc.Height), rc, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
00374             // Prepare for imposing
00375             roundedRect.Width--;
00376             roundedRect.Height--;
00377             // Impose the rounded rectangle with transparent color
00378             Bitmap borderImage = ImposeRoundedRectangle(roundedRect, borderColor, size);
00379             // Draw the transparent rounded rectangle
00380             ImageAttributes attrib = new ImageAttributes();
00381             attrib.SetColorKey(Color.Green, Color.Green);
00382             gxRounded.DrawImage(borderImage, new Rectangle(0, 0, rc.Width, rc.Height), 0, 0, borderImage.Width, borderImage.Height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel, attrib);
00383             // OK... now are ready to draw the final image on the original graphics
00384             gx.DrawImageTransparent(roundedImage, rc);
00385 
00386             // Clean up
00387             attrib.Dispose();
00388             tempGx.Dispose();
00389             tempBitmap.Dispose();
00390             roundedImage.Dispose();
00391             gxRounded.Dispose();            
00392         }

00395         public static void DrawRoundedRect(Graphics g, Pen p, Color backColor, Rectangle rc, Size size)
00396         {
00397             Point[] points = new Point[8];
00398 
00399             //prepare points for poligon
00400             points[0].X = rc.Left + size.Width / 2;
00401             points[0].Y = rc.Top + 1;   
00402             points[1].X = rc.Right - size.Width / 2;
00403             points[1].Y = rc.Top + 1;
00404 
00405             points[2].X = rc.Right;
00406             points[2].Y = rc.Top + size.Height / 2;
00407             points[3].X = rc.Right;
00408             points[3].Y = rc.Bottom - size.Height / 2;
00409 
00410             points[4].X = rc.Right - size.Width / 2;
00411             points[4].Y = rc.Bottom;
00412             points[5].X = rc.Left + size.Width / 2;
00413             points[5].Y = rc.Bottom;
00414 
00415             points[6].X = rc.Left + 1;
00416             points[6].Y = rc.Bottom - size.Height / 2;
00417             points[7].X = rc.Left + 1;
00418             points[7].Y = rc.Top + size.Height / 2;
00419 
00420             //prepare brush for background
00421             Brush fillBrush = new SolidBrush(backColor);
00422 
00423             //draw side lines and circles in the corners
00424             g.DrawLine(p, rc.Left + size.Width / 2, rc.Top,
00425              rc.Right - size.Width / 2, rc.Top);
00426                        
00427             g.FillEllipse(fillBrush, rc.Right - size.Width, rc.Top,
00428              size.Width, size.Height);
00429 
00430             g.DrawEllipse(p, rc.Right - size.Width, rc.Top,
00431             size.Width, size.Height);
00432 
00433 
00434             g.DrawLine(p, rc.Right, rc.Top + size.Height / 2,
00435              rc.Right, rc.Bottom - size.Height / 2);
00436 
00437             g.FillEllipse(fillBrush, rc.Right - size.Width, rc.Bottom - size.Height,
00438             size.Width, size.Height);
00439 
00440             g.DrawEllipse(p, rc.Right - size.Width, rc.Bottom - size.Height,
00441              size.Width, size.Height);
00442 
00443            
00444 
00445             g.DrawLine(p, rc.Right - size.Width / 2, rc.Bottom,
00446              rc.Left + size.Width / 2, rc.Bottom);
00447 
00448             g.FillEllipse(fillBrush, rc.Left, rc.Bottom - size.Height,
00449             size.Width, size.Height);
00450 
00451             g.DrawEllipse(p, rc.Left, rc.Bottom - size.Height,
00452              size.Width, size.Height);
00453            
00454             
00455 
00456             g.DrawLine(p, rc.Left, rc.Bottom - size.Height / 2,
00457              rc.Left, rc.Top + size.Height / 2);
00458             g.FillEllipse(fillBrush, rc.Left, rc.Top,
00459              size.Width, size.Height);
00460 
00461             g.DrawEllipse(p, rc.Left, rc.Top,
00462             size.Width, size.Height);
00463                   
00464             //fill the background and remove the internal arcs  
00465             g.FillPolygon(fillBrush, points);
00466             //dispose the brush
00467             fillBrush.Dispose();
00468         }
